left.name: diagnosis_ICD_category
left.description: Disease category as defined in the WHO ICD-10

meta.notes: This refers to the body systems chapters of the WHO ICD-10, https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

notes.data: This refers to the body systems chapters of the WHO ICD-10

left.name: diagnosis_ICD_term
left.description: ICD-10 code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: C41.1: Malignant neoplasms of mandible, C16.9: Malignant neoplasm of stomach, unspecified
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in ICD-10 separated by a (:). For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

right.name: diagnosis_ICD_term
right.description: Name of diagnosis

description.data: Name of diagnosis

examples.data: C41.1: Malignant neoplasms of mandible, C16.9: Malignant neoplasm of stomach, unspecified

notes.data: Write code and full term used in ICD-10 separated by a (:). For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

left.name: diagnosis_mondo_term
left.description: Mondo code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: MONDO_0002131: jaw cancer, MONDO_0001056: gastric cancer
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in MONDO separated by a (:). For MONDO codes, refer to https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/mondo

left.name: is_cancer_primary
left.description: Diagnosis is a primary cancer diagnosis

meta.notes: This field is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer

data.name: is_cancer_primary
data.description: Diagnosis is a primary cancer diagnosis

meta.notes: This field is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer

left.name: tumour_staging_system
left.description: Indicate the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of the diagnosis, prior to treatment

right.name: tumour_staging_system
right.description: Indicate the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of primary diagnosis (prior to treatment).

description.data: Indicate the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of primary diagnosis (prior to treatment).

left.name: clinical_stage_group
left.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.)

meta.notes: This field is dependent on the selected tumour_staging_system

right.name: clinical_stage_group
right.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

meta.notes: This field is dependent on the selected tumour_staging_system

description.data: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

left.name: t_category
left.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

right.name: t_category
right.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

description.data: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

left.name: n_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

right.name: n_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

description.data: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

left.name: m_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

right.name: m_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

description.data: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

left.name: smoking_status
left.description: Smoking status of a patient at the time of the data collection

right.name: smoking_status
right.description: Smoking status of a patient at the time of the data collection.

description.data: Smoking status of a patient at the time of the data collection.

left.name: smoking_pack_years
left.description: Number of packs of cigarettes per day multiplied by the number of years donor smoked

meta.notes: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes (20 cigarettes per pack) smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

right.name: smoking_pack_years
right.description: Number of packs of cigarette multiplied by the number of cigarettes smoked

meta.notes: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes (20 cigarettes per pack) smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

description.data: Number of packs of cigarette multiplied by the number of cigarettes smoked

left.name: alcohol_status
left.description: Alcohol consumtion based on recommended daily limit

codeList: Alcohol intake within recommended daily limit
Alcohol intake exceeds recommended daily limit

meta.notes: Refer to the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, for men, no more than 15 drinks a week, with no more than 3 drinks a day most days. No more than 4 drinks on any single occasion. For women, no more than 10 drinks a week, with no more than 2 drinks a day most days. No more than 3 drinks on any single occasion.

right.name: alcohol_status
right.description: Alcohol consumtion based on recommended daily limit

codeList: Alcohol intake within recommended daily limit
Alcohol intake exceeds recommended daily limit

meta.notes: Refer to the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, for men, no more than 15 drinks a week, with no more than 3 drinks a day most days. No more than 4 drinks on any single occasion. For women, no more than 10 drinks a week, with no more than 2 drinks a day most days. No more than 3 drinks on any single occasion.
